name: Take a Trip to Britain
overview: Enter 'SHOW PASSPORT' at first question. More of an educational one as you learn about history and have to fix grammatical errors and have some general knowledge (for the time it was made). It doesn't give you the right answers if you get them wrong, though. I cut-out the places where you have to flip the disk (which is A LOT) making it very annoying unless you use a second drive or hard drive. Published in 1988 by Falken Verlag GmbH/reLINE Software. The programmer is Fabian Rosenschein.
